sentences.en: " I got some lard, " he would add, as an afterthought.
sentences.cn: “ 我买了一些猪油, " 他会补充说, 像是又想起来了.

sentences.en: After sifting the flour into a mixing bowl, cut the lard in.
sentences.cn: 把面粉筛入搅拌的碗中后, 再把猪油加进去.

sentences.en: Antioxidations from extracts of different solvents are determined by lard as substrate.
sentences.cn: 用猪油作为底物,测定了不同溶剂提取物的抗氧化性能.

sentences.en: I must render down this fat; we are short of lard.
sentences.cn: 我得把这块肥肉熬成油, 我们正缺猪油.

sentences.en: It was determined with lard, walnut kernel and salad as the substrates.
sentences.cn: 本文以猪油 、 核桃仁和色拉酱等富含油脂食品为底物研究了蜂胶的抗氧化作用.

sentences.en: Let's remove the lard from the recipe. It's not very healthy.
sentences.cn: 我们把配方里的猪油去掉 吧. 它不很健康.

sentences.en: Ok so it goes against the grain to spend £20 on moisturiser when you have saddle soap and an old packet of lard in the cupboard, but buy it you must.
sentences.cn: 这样做就像当你的柜橱中只有脊肉汤和一袋旧猪油时你却花费20英镑去买保湿霜一样不合常情，你必须得放弃这样的想法。

sentences.en: Perhaps, you shouldn't even have bothered about this ungrateful lump of lard.
sentences.cn: 或许当初你们还真的不需要那么麻烦.

sentences.en: Put water, butter and lard into a saucepan and bring slowly to the boil.
sentences.cn: 把水、黄油和猪油倒入平底锅，然后慢火煮沸。

sentences.en: Reasons of forming first cracks were foundry lacuna, impurity gathering , lard exiting.
sentences.cn: 铸造缺陷 、 杂质元素偏聚和夹杂物的存在是形成早期裂纹源的原因.

sentences.en: She likes to lard the chicken with some bacon.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢在鸡肉里加点腌猪肉.

sentences.en: The children are cheerful as lard , starting home for the holidays.
sentences.cn: 放假在家,孩子们快活的像云雀.

sentences.en: The lard was tried in a big kettle.
To melt ( lard, for example ) to separate out impurities; render.
sentences.cn: 提炼焙化 ( 如,猪油 ) 以分离出油渣; 炼油.

sentences.en: You celebrate your birthday with taro, red bean, and lard.
sentences.cn: 用红豆 、 芋头和猪油给自己过生日.

phrases.tran_cn: 猪油；精制猪油（由猪油提炼出来的油，供作滑润油及灯油之用）

trans.tran_en: white fat from pigs that is used in cooking

trans.tran_cn: 润色，涂猪油于，将肥猪肉片嵌于（牛肉或禽肉）中，（在讲话或文章中）夹杂大量（某类词语）
